CustomField.description: this combination is used for automatic calculation of products when we enter a project. This field calculation is used in coding
CustomField.formula: Text(Property_Type__c) +'-'+ text(SWR_System_to_be_Deployed__c) +'-'+ text(Dimension_of_Stack__c) +'-'+ text(Material__c) +'-'+ text(Number_of_Floors_Min__c) +'-'+ text(Number_of_Floors_Max__c)
CustomField.label: Combination for calculation
